channel.title: Defeat RPG
channel.description: Well one of the T&S Game Creations members is making a new seperate rpg type game much related to final fantasy games. im not really sure of the details quite yet, but he said that it will be quite a hit. Because this is his project i cant force him to release it open source. i believe a demo will released tomorrow so I'm just getting the word out.

item.title: Defeat RPG
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:31, topic:400397”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=497472.msg3639196#msg3639196 date=1308847788]

this is a rsps community, not gml community.

LOL Then why would this site even have an Off Topic section and General Programming Section in the forum? Obviously to have different types of coding languages and games other than RSPS.

Off topic = Nothing to do with coding
General programming = GML isn’t really programming
[/quote]
Same can be said about Visual Basic, yet we have an award.
[/quote]As much as it isn’t really that hard or great of a language, VB is indeed a programming language, unlike GML (which is a markup language). However, staff (I think Moparisthebest himself) made an exception for GML and allowed them to be posted here…

Read full topic

item.title: Defeat RPG
item.dc:creator: @qawsedrftgyhujikol qawsedrftgyhujikol
item.description:
@qawsedrftgyhujikol wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:23, topic:400397”][quote author=qawsedrftgyhujikol link=topic=497472.msg3639315#msg3639315 date=1308853565]

this is a rsps community, not gml community.

LOL Then why would this site even have an Off Topic section and General Programming Section in the forum? Obviously to have different types of coding languages and games other than RSPS.

Off topic = Nothing to do with coding
General programming = GML isn’t really programming

Read that.

en.wikipedia.org

GameMaker Studio

C++ (Runtime) GameMaker Studio (formerly Animo until 1999, Game Maker until 2011, GameMaker until 2012, and GameMaker: Studio until 2017) is a cross-platform game engine developed by YoYo Games. GameMaker accommodates the creation of cross-platform and multi-genre video games using a custom drag-and-drop visual programming language or a scripting language known as Game Maker Language, which can be used to develop more advanced games that could not be created just by using the drag and drop featur...


[/quote]
You seriously are one big idiot aren’t you?[/quote]
HAHA!! No, I’m not. I have a 4.0 GPA on average actually.

And it seems to me that your the idiot. At LEAST this guy can actually make something and release it unlike you.

Read full topic

@rip4d wrote:

Really? Putting effort into something and actually making it his own is nothing. Does that mean that all of the little kids leeching servers and saying that its 100% theirs is something?

Seriously, he’s actually contributing something to the community. It may not be rsps, but its something.

item.title: Defeat RPG
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:400397”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=497472.msg3638090#msg3638090 date=1308745012]
The reason he comes with another game like every day is because like other people said, Game Maker, to make games easy and fast.

It’s made for lazy fags who don’t want to learn and want to finish games in 2 hours hoping they will be rich and are thinking

“O Hurr duurrrrr I iz finish game with game maker, me iz rich, me are gme maer, ZURRRRRRRR.”
[/quote]Think of it this way, he’s at least creating something original unlike the vast majority of members in this community.[/quote]
His games? Original?

I hope you’re being sarcastic?

Read full topic
